nodes.text: Carol Titelman (spouse name: Wikarska) (1946 - December 7, 2019) was a key member of the staff during the early days of Lucasfilm. She joined the company months before the release of the first movie, Star Wars, as Charles Lippincott secretary, while they were romantically engaged together. She soon came to direct three departments : Art, Publishing and Creative Services in the late 1970's. In particular, she helped with the creation of art-focused books. Titelman left Lucasfilm when its offices moved to Northern California.
